posts.post_content:
Working on an SGC 40 set and need a few cards.  Preference is for them to be pretty close to centered.  Please send me a scan of the card along with a fair price for the card to [url]charlieoneal@carolina.rr.com[/url].  Since its been awhile since being on the board my ebay id is vintage_card_heaven for your reference.

cards I need

25. Harry Bay
38. Bill Bernhard
